channel.title: Sports
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from Sports, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Best Sports Betting Apps 2026: Top Betting Sites Reviewed
item.description: Compare the best sports betting apps and sites for 2026. See reviews, bonuses, and features to help choose the right sportsbook for your needs.

item.title: Steve Phelps Resigns As NASCAR Commissioner
item.description: NASCAR commissioner Steve Phelps is out after just 10 months in the role.

item.description: Bet $5 or more, get $150 back in bonus bets if your bet wins with our FanDuel sportsbook offer for new users after their first bet wins.

item.title: Best Sportsbook Promos & Bonus Bets - January 2026 Top Offers
item.description: Discover the best sportsbook promos and bonus bets for January 2026. Compare welcome offers and top bonuses from leading betting sites.

item.title: BetMGM Bonus Code 'FOXSPORTS' Gets Up to $1,500 Paid Back in Bonus Bets
item.description: Use BetMGM Bonus Code FOXSPORTS to get up to $1,500 back in Bonus Bets if your first wager loses. Claim your BetMGM welcome offer today.

item.title: Ranking the top American tennis players as 2026 begins
item.description: Coco Gauff won another major title in 2025, and Taylor Fritz continued to lead the American men. But who else is set to make a move in 2026?

item.title: Why Matthew Stafford's command of the huddle gives Rams an edge
item.description: Ahead of Saturday's playoff game, the Rams quarterback's demeanor and football IQ renders him a unique signal-caller.

item.title: 'Fragile' no more: How the Bears' Caleb Williams, Ben Johnson evolved
item.description: Williams thought Johnson didn't like him at one point, but the duo evolved to lead the playoff-bound Bears.

item.title: Bracketology: Kentucky is biggest winner as upsets shake up top 16
item.description: The new year has brought some big upsets, a shake-up of the top 16 seeds and a new-look Bracketology.

item.title: AP Top 25 poll reaction: What to know about every team
item.description: The new women's AP Top 25 poll is out. Here's what's next for every team in the standings.
